jdbcService.sql: insert into workflow_instances ( id, definition_id, parent_id, batch_id, context_id, group_id, correlation_id, workflow_type, uri, started, stopped, environment, transition_state, state_id ) values ( :id, :definitionId, :parentId, :batchId, :contextId, :groupId, :correlationId, :workflowType, :uri, :started, :stopped, :environment, :transitionState, :stateId )
